Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Flirtation \Flir*ta"tion\, n. 1. Playing at courtship; coquetry. [1913 Webster]
The flirtations and jealousies of our ball rooms. --Macaulay. [1913 Webster]
flirtation n : playful behavior intended to arouse sexual interest [syn: {flirt}, {flirting}, {coquetry}, {dalliance}, {toying}]
